meanings.definition: A person or thing that creates maps.
meanings.sent1: The mappers drew a detailed map of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I used a mapper to create a map of the hiking trail.
meanings.sent3: The mappers decided to map out the best ice cream shops in town.
meanings.sent4: She was a mapper of emotions, charting the highs and lows of the characters.
meanings.sent5: The mappers meticulously marked every tree on the map for accuracy.

meanings.definition: A software tool used to create maps.
meanings.sent1: The new mapper software is user-friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: I downloaded a mapper to help me navigate the city streets.
meanings.sent3: The mapper program decided to take a vacation and refused to work.
meanings.sent4: The mapper transformed the screen into a colorful, interactive map.
meanings.sent5: With the mapper, you can zoom in to see even the tiniest details on the map.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who create maps collaboratively.
meanings.sent1: The mappers worked together to create a map of the national park.
meanings.sent2: Our team of mappers completed the map project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The mappers had a map-making competition to see who could draw the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The mappers were like a well-oiled machine, each contributing their expertise.
meanings.sent5: The group of mappers celebrated their successful mapping expedition with a picnic.
